name: HTML-to-PDF API
changelog: Switched to Selenium with headless Chrome for browser-perfect rendering
Fixed blank PDF issue - now uses temporary file instead of data URL
Handles broken HTML syntax errors gracefully (maxheight, undefinedpx, etc)
No compilation required - pure Python packages
Updated Dockerfile to use modern GPG key method
Enhanced PDF rendering to match browser display exactly
Added browser-default CSS for all HTML elements
